item.title: Covers and first pages of Lloyd's Kora Hottentot Book I -2 or MP2
item.comments: 1) Note inside front cover says: 'Pp. 90-125. From 12 June, 1879 to ', 2) Note on contents page opp, written very lightly in pencil: 'Large animal on left is â€¦ name of worm [?] from Piet', 3) This story is found in Kora Book I-2
